name: Arbok's nest
description: All pokemons of your team are poisoned

name: Insect swarm
description: One pokemon is poisoned

name: Magmar's cave
description: All pokemons of your team are on burn

name: Cyndaquil's overheat
description: One pokemon is on burn

name: Magnemite gang
description: All pokemons of your team are paralyzed

name: Elekid discharge
description: One pokemon is paralyzed

name: Hoopa's curse
description: All pokemons of your team are cursed

name: Haunter's lick
description: One pokemon is cursed

name: Jigglypuff sing
description: All pokemons of your team sleeps

name: Hypno's hypnosis
description: One pokemon sleeps

name: Jynx blizzard
description: All pokemons of your team freezes

name: Snorunt's icy passive
description: One pokemon freeze

name: Psyduck's headache
description: All pokemons of your team gets confused

name: Drowzee's confusion
description: One pokemon get confused

name: Team Rocket
description: Roll d20: 1: They steal a pokemon from your team. 2-4: They steal a random treasure from you. 5-10: They steal a random item from you. 11-19: You escape. 20: You earn a treasure.

name: Horde of Taurus
description: if you don't have a pokemon that can fly or ride, your first pokemon is defeated

name: Crawdaunt surf
description: if you don't have a pokemon that can swim, go back 1d6

name: Sleeping Snorlax
description: Take another route, wake him or wait 3 turns

name: Ground hole
description: If you don't have a rope, lose a turn

name: Blocking path rock
description: If you don't have a fighter/earth/rock pokemon on your team you lose a turn
